name: starter-wdio
description: UI Test automation framework based on WebdriverIO

scripts.clean: rimraf .tsbuid && rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf junit-results
scripts.wdio-web: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.web.conf.ts
scripts.wdio-web-docker: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.docker.conf.ts
scripts.wdio-mobile: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.conf.ts
